title: im online through maintance
body: how is it possible to can play games?through maintance

replies.body: If you're talking about Pbe, it'll auto kick you sometime soon, even if you're in game.

I'm not sure what you mean?  I don't believe there was any downtime on your region, but any news on that would be posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).  Let me know if you're still having an issue and with more details on what's going on.
